entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as one of the people who will be following the trail in different directions. He warns Harry and Hermione that Fang is a coward.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as one of the people who will be following the trail in different directions. He quickly wants to take Fang.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is a dog that Hagrid has and Malfoy wants to take him. He is described as having long teeth.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as one of the people who will be following the trail in different directions.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as one of the people who will be following the trail in different directions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people who will be following the trail in different directions. He and Hermione take the left path with Hagrid.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people who will be following the trail in different directions. She takes the left path with Harry and Hagrid.

entities.name: unicorn
entities.description: The unicorn is mentioned as something that they are trying to find. If anyone finds it, they will send up green sparks.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are walking together with Hagrid.
Harry is walking with Hagrid and Hermione.
Hermione is walking with Harry and Hagrid.
Draco and Neville are walking together with Fang.
Harry will find the unicorn if he sees it first.
Hermione will find the unicorn if she sees it first.
Hagrid will find the unicorn if he sees it first.
